title: An Assassin with an AOE stun, shield, slow, movement speed steal, roll, 2 blinks and a heal.

replies.body: At least they don't hate on his "Dark and secret past".
still more ballanced than an assasin with 2dashes ,2 blinks, no delay on burst double snare, a clone, invisibility and completly no requirement to aim
Hell no she is not. LB has way more counterplay and Ekko is not more balanced than she is.

oh yyou juked my q  ... i cant all inn you now and it ate a load of mana ... hope you wont go for me while i have it on cooldown
oh you are too far from my slowing field ... i have no chances to either stunn you or to get shield thus i wont be suiciding on you 
oh you cc'ed me... i hope ill survive till ccends to press r 
oh my ult is on cooldown ... i hope you dont knoiw that my clone is nonexistent now 
i used my e ... please dont hit me 

lb and counterplay (2 things that have nothing in common)

this guy is counterable by any champion, the thing is that you need to know how to do it, and it takes some using to 
survive him in normals more and look for what can you do, you will find loads of things that are easy to exploit

his late game is actually really and since he damage burst is so delayed. his dose on dame until the second q return and in the time farm he jstu get insta bursted and peoepl get away from with falls or mobility spell or what ever. once adc get basnhi he is pretty mcu h done in the game

You know, you really sounded like a troll until today I saw your name on EUNE's ranked game previews.

Why do you not capitalize your words? It does make you appear less intelligent, I have no way of telling if you're the same person playing on the account in the end either.

myou mean that little box to the right in the home screen? btw how did you see that since you are in  na?
and I'm in prom ot master why is the queue time over 16 second when riot say approx 0.52...  i do noir i should er queue or not
